title: Provided that, in the situations where conveyance shopping is not desirable and specifically requested by majority of slum dwellers and such area can be proposed by any dimension as permissible and for any other commercial users like banks / offices / community hall / self help group etc
clause_text: Provided that, in the situations where conveyance shopping is not desirable and specifically requested by majority of slum dwellers and such area can be proposed by any dimension as permissible and for any other commercial users like banks / offices / community hall / self help group etc. Provided further that, the modalities on operational aspects, additional uses and allotment process for occupation of such structure shall be decided by C.E.O., S.R.A.
